_header: Pray for him that made this scrite
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Prayer for the scribe of the manuscript — three couplets

HunHM129.Transcription:
Prai for hym þat made þis scryteÞat god make hym and
                    vs off synnys quyteAnd len hym and vs grace for to lyueÞat we
                    þe gost to god may gyueÞat hit be so say InwardlyA pater
                    noster and an Aue
HunHM129.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 250.
